alert.note: Alert for Fisher; Jones; Taylor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 02 at 7:34PM CDT until June 02 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Angelo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Jones County in west central Texas... Northwestern Taylor County in west central Texas... Eastern Fisher County in west central Texas... * Until 830 PM CDT. * At 734 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Sylvester, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Neinda around 750 PM CDT. Trent and Noodle around 800 PM CDT. Anson around 805 PM CDT. Merkel around 810 PM CDT. Tye and Hawley around 820 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Funston, Hodges, The Intersection Of Us- 180 And Ranch Road 126, Stith, Truby and The Intersection Of Us- 180 And Farm Road 600. This includes Interstate 20 between Mile Markers 261 and 276. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
